meanings.definition: The state or quality of being heterogeneous.
meanings.sent1: The heterogeny of the group made it diverse.
meanings.sent2: The heterogeny of colors in the painting created a beautiful contrast.
meanings.sent3: The party was a mix of heterogeny, with people from all walks of life.
meanings.sent4: In the garden, the heterogeny of flowers blooming together was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The heterogeny of flavors in the dish made it a culinary masterpiece.

meanings.definition: The presence of different kinds or types within a group or population.
meanings.sent1: The heterogeny of opinions in the meeting led to a lively discussion.
meanings.sent2: The heterogeny of species in the ecosystem ensured its resilience.
meanings.sent3: The classroom was a heterogeny of talents, each student bringing something unique.
meanings.sent4: The city's heterogeny of architecture reflected its rich history.
meanings.sent5: The heterogeny of skills among team members made them a strong, versatile group.
